Group.label: Group 1: if the internal door contact (magnet) is triggered it sends a Z-Wave frame to every node in this group.
Group 2: if the external door contact is triggered it sends a Z-Wave frame to every node in this group if it is configured (see configuration documentation param 2: external contact).
